rows.label: qst104205_msg0001
rows.name:
Eyup, pal! I'm racking
my brains a bit here.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0002
rows.name:
The building's not in the worst of
shape, all things considered...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0003
rows.name:
But if there's gonna be kids using
it day in, day out, it could probably
do with being a bit more sturdy.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0004
rows.name:
I dunno where we'd get our hands on
the materials for that, though...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0005
rows.name: Really?! You guys are the best!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0006
rows.name:
Can I ask you to gather a few
things right away, then? You can
give them to the kids over there.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0007
rows.name:
Martis needs some wood,
Kazuna needs decorations,
and Kukuri needs some ore.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0008
rows.name:
They all offered to lend me a hand.
Said they wanted to help build their
own new school - isn't that grand?

rows.label: qst104205_msg0009
rows.name:
When I see passion like
that, it makes me want to
do the best job I can do!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0101
rows.name:
Martis needs some wood,
Kazuna needs decorations,
and Kukuri needs some ore.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0102
rows.name:
Once you've gathered
enough, just let me know!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0201
rows.name: You gathered all the stuff? Fantastic!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0202
rows.name: Then let's get straight to work!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0203
rows.name: Erm...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0204
rows.name:
Well, actually, I can't start
working right away just like that.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0205
rows.name:
Why don't you go help the mayor
with something else while I get
everything sorted here?

rows.label: qst104205_msg0301
rows.name:
It feels so good to work on
something worthwhile together!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0401
rows.name:
A lesson from Rex-sensei... I feel
lucky to witness such a rare sight!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0501
rows.name:
Finally even the teachers are here...
The mayor's dream has come true!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0502
rows.name:
I hope all the kids'll study hard and
grow up into super smart people!
